qa.name: Ancient Oak
qa.appearance: Massive tree with gnarled branches and deep-set eyes in its trunk

tr.name: Medieval Knight Sir Galahad
tr.appearance: Tall and muscular, clad in shining armor
tr.clothing: Full plate armor with a red cross

xc.name: Modern Scientist Dr. Emma Chen
xc.appearance: Slender with glasses and a neat ponytail

json_to_edit.voice_over: I have stood here for millennia, watching humanity's journey unfold before my very eyes.
json_to_edit.description: An ancient oak tree observes key moments in human evolution across different time periods.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, birds chirping, distant human activity
json_to_edit.name: Witness to Evolution
json_to_edit.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution from prehistoric times to the modern era.

qa.action: The ancient oak stands tall in the center of a forest clearing, surrounded by nature.

hf.action: The oak's eyes, formed by knots in its trunk, blink slowly as it awakens.

tr.action: Caveman Grug enters the clearing, dragging a crude stone tool.

xc.action: Sir Galahad rides into view on his horse, the scene transitioning to medieval times.

ka.action: Sir Galahad's gauntleted hand rests on the hilt of his sword as he surveys the area.

fn.action: The scene shifts to modern day as Dr. Emma Chen enters, carrying scientific equipment.

af.action: Dr. Chen sets up her equipment near the base of the oak tree, unaware of its sentience.

qo.action: A small smile forms on the oak's face as it contemplates the progress of humanity.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 2, 5, 1, 7, 3, 6, 4, 8. Don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: I have stood here for millennia, watching humanity's journey unfold before my very eyes.
updated_json.description: An ancient oak tree observes key moments in human evolution across different time periods.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, birds chirping, distant human activity
updated_json.name: Witness to Evolution
updated_json.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution from prehistoric times to the modern era.

qa.action: The ancient oak stands tall in the center of a forest clearing, surrounded by nature.

hf.action: The oak's eyes, formed by knots in its trunk, blink slowly as it awakens.

tr.action: Caveman Grug enters the clearing, dragging a crude stone tool.

xc.action: Sir Galahad rides into view on his horse, the scene transitioning to medieval times.

ka.action: Sir Galahad's gauntleted hand rests on the hilt of his sword as he surveys the area.

fn.action: The scene shifts to modern day as Dr. Emma Chen enters, carrying scientific equipment.

af.action: Dr. Chen sets up her equipment near the base of the oak tree, unaware of its sentience.

qo.action: A small smile forms on the oak's face as it contemplates the progress of humanity.

label.rationale:
we will rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director. the current order of shots is represented by the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object. we need to update this order according to the new sequence: 2, 5, 1, 7, 3, 6, 4, 8. 

here's how we'll map the new order to the existing shot keys:
2 (close-up of oak's eyes) -> hf
5 (close-up of sir galahad's hand) -> ka
1 (extreme wide shot of oak) -> qa
7 (medium shot of dr. chen) -> af
3 (wide shot of caveman grug) -> tr
6 (wide shot of dr. chen entering) -> fn
4 (medium shot of sir galahad) -> xc
8 (extreme close-up of oak's smile) -> qo

we will update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object to reflect this new order. no other changes will be made to the scene as per the director's instructions.
